Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1969...
Injured on 7/25/1970 with a Concussion, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 4/30/1973 with a Torn Hip Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1975, off Pete Richert (NYM)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/2/1975, off Pete Richert (NYM)...
Drove in 6 runs against Philadelphia on 5/16/1975...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 7/1/1975...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1975, hitting .259 with 32 HR, 98 RBI...
Traded from Los Angeles to Detroit on 1/31/1977 (Going to LA: CF K. Yamamoto, RF J. Clark. Going to DET: RF J. Burroughs, P D. Vossler, SS W. Randolph, C E. Rodriguez)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/18/1978, hitting .520 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/28/1980, hitting .632 with 1 HR, 4 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Oakland on 6/14/1982...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/16/1983, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 6/21/1983...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
